evidence.text: ORDERED that the Motion is GRANTED, and the Consent Decree is PROVISIONALLY ENTERED

extracted.value: Joint Motion for Provisional Approval and Entry of Consent Decree was granted and the Consent Decree provisionally entered.

evidence.text: ORDERED that the Fairness Hearing on the Terms of the Consent Decree is scheduled to be held on ______, 2025

extracted.value: Fairness Hearing on the Terms of the Consent Decree scheduled to be held on ______, 2025.

evidence.text: ORDERED that all case management deadlines are stayed pending the Court’s determination, at or after the Fairness Hearing on the Terms of the Consent Decree

extracted.value: All case management deadlines stayed pending the Court’s determination.

evidence.text: ORDER granting 10 Motion to Stay is GRANTED and that all case management deadlines, including the United States' deadline to serve the Summons and Complaint on the City of Durham, are stayed pending the courts resolution of the Parties' Joint Motion for Provisional Approval and Entry of Consent Decree.

ORDER signed by JUDGE THOMAS D. SCHROEDER on 01/15/2025, that the motion (Doc. 13 ) is GRANTED. The word limit for the briefing the court requested regarding the applicability of Ricci v. Destefano, 557 U.S. 557 (2009), is increased to 9,000 words.

extracted.value: Motion to Exceed Word Limitation (Motion 13) was granted.

evidence.text: ORDER that the motion 14 is GRANTED in that American Alliance for Equal Rights is granted leave to file its brief as amicus curiae as a separate document forthwith.
ORDER signed by MAG/JUDGE JOI ELIZABETH PEAKE on 01/30/2025, granting 26 Motion for L.R. 5.5 Report-Joint as approved as submitted.
